response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Given its immense potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a highly competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of this collaboration.", "product_price": 950000}
